title: Uncalled for 'sequel'
review: Not only it went against the prequel's story, but also it left the door open for another film. Nothing happens in this after all. All they did is take our money, put us to sleep very likely and tell us to come back and give them more money for the inevitable sequel/franchise/universe/vomit.Here are things hinted at but not resolved: dystopia, army, child birth, successor, corporate corruption and of course lovers' relationship.Don't give it your money. Three stars for the girlfriend's eyes, hair, thighs and home cooking.
